cause.description:
There's been fked up celebrities messing things up a bit. Like it starts off with stupid rich bitch Paris Hilton, then Britney is being retarted, and now, Lindsay is just going plain nuts and shes fked and wasted. So, we shud be able to get rid of those stupid celebrities and stop them messing things up!
1. To gossip
2. To stop stupid celebrities fucking up the world
3. Having just something to talk about
cause.mission: A place where you can write crap about stupid fked up celebrities and how to get rid of them
cause.name: We Don't Care Fuck About Fucked Up Stars
